thread.title: Super location, super little hotel
thread.title_full: Super location, super little hotel - Review of Hotel Parc St. Severin - Esprit de France, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Enjoy_Beach_Life
title: Super location, super little hotel
text:
Paris is not cheap, we all know this, so as long as the place you are staying in or eating at delivers, you kinda have to forget the price...
This is a super little hotel, bang in the middle of the Latin Quarter, just south of Notre Dame. Great room in terms of comfort and amenities, shower was perfect (big plus in my book) and you could not hear a sound from either outside or from within the hotel.
Breakfast was typical french, did the trick and the waitress was super friendly and spoke no english (which was as it should be in France :) )
Great night sleep, super location, and in terms of value was good (for Paris). This is not a luxury hotel, just a decent place to have you base in this wonderful city.
